alert.note: Alert for Faulkner (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 15 at 6:35PM CDT until October 15 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN VAN BUREN...SOUTHWESTERN CLEBURNE AND NORTHEASTERN FAULKNER COUNTIES... At 634 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Woolly Hollow State Park, or 18 miles northeast of Conway, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Greenbrier... Wooster... Quitman... Guy... Damascus... Twin Groves... Woolly Hollow State Park... Barney... Enders... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
